code:
%% L1 to L2 Message Flow sequenceDiagram participant User as USER/CONTRACT participant L1 as L1 (LineaRollup) participant Coord as Coordinator participant L2 as L2 (L2MessageService) User->>L1: 1. sendMessage() L1->>L1: 2. MessageSent event L1->>Coord: Event detected Coord->>L2: 3. Anchor hash L2->>L2: 4. Hash stored Note over L2: Message now CLAIMABLE User->>L2: 5. claimMessage()
(or Postman) L2->>L2: 6. Execute calldata L2-->>User: Message delivered

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 LineaRollup 和 L2MessageService。
